knit 10 see written instructions for which charts and r4ounds to work for each size 9 3 p - purl 8 2 7 1 c4b - cable 4 back - slip 2 sts to cn hold in 6 chart a baby and adult sm - work rou5nds 1 - 6 back of work k2 from lh needle k2 from cn 4 c4f - cable 4 front - slip 2 sts to cn hold in 36 front of work k2 from lh needle k2 from cn 2 ws 5 14 rs c4b-decrease - cable 4 back decrease - slip 2 sts to 3 cn hold in back of work k2 from lh needle 2 k2tog from cn 1 st decrease 1 19-st repeat c4f-decrease - double pointed needles 6 k2tog - knit 2 sts together 5 lh - left hand 4 3 p2tog - purl 2 sts together 2 ssk - slip 2 sts knitwise 1 at a time then 1 knit 2 slipped sts together through back loops 21-st repeat pm -
